q_en: For all sewing tasks completed by Master Sewers, which ones were created after February 1, 2024?
hint: Don't ignore the time condition of February 1, 2024

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Master Sewers';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the group named 'Master Sewers'

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM sewing_tasks WHERE working_group_id = 2;
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing task IDs for tasks completed by the 'Master Sewers' group

steps.sql: ['SELECT id FROM sewing_tasks WHERE id IN (1, 4, 5, 10, 12, 13, 14, 15, 24, 30, 36) AND end_time > '2024-02-01';']
steps.description: Identify the sewing tasks completed after February 1, 2024
steps.results: (1064, "You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near '['SELECT id FROM sewing_tasks WHERE id IN (1, 4, 5, 10, 12, 13, 14, 15, 24, 30, ' at line 1")
